name: companyjuice/fliche
description: Fliche is a set of classes providing a modular, object-oriented and accessible interface for interacting with videos and audio thru FFmpeg.

suggest.tedivm/stash: Stash is required to utilise Fliches Default Cache class 'Cache_Stash', however you can build your own caching classes so that Stash is not required.
suggest.monolog/monolog: Monolog is required to utilise Fliches Default Logging class 'Logger_Monolog', however you can build your own logger classes so that Monolog is not required.
